title: Morocco
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 424 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 730L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Z
description: Located on the northwest coast of Africa, Morocco is a country that is both ancient and modern. Students can learn about its interesting culture as well as its land, people, and history with this engaging book.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
